Job Description: Required Skill:   OOPS, data structures, multithreading, collection, basic programming    Qualification:   B. Tech, MCA, BCA, M. Tech.         Good Communication skills (Must).     4 to 8 years of software development experience with 3 years of extensive experience on Java platform.     Able to contribute bestinclass programming, to develop highly innovative, maintainable Java BE code targeting for Mobile Apps consumption via Restful web services     Able to understand the requirement and design/architecture of the solution.     Responsible for ensuring that Java best practices are adhered.     Responsible for coding, unit testing and delivery of high quality work.       Responsible for high-level and low-level technical design documentation.       Quick learner and highly motivated to keep himself/ herself abreast with latest technologies.     Strong experience in SOA, Restful web services, NoSQL, SQL, MySQL, JSON and OOPs using Java platform.     Strong experience in programming languages and framework - Java, J2EE, Spring MVC Framework, and Hibernate etc.     Strong in Object Oriented concepts, particularly on class hierarchy, constructors etc.
